european_regional_organizations.name: European Union
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote peace, freedom, and justice across Europe.

european_regional_organizations.name: Council of Europe
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To uphold human rights, democracy, and the rule of law in Europe.

european_regional_organizations.name: Central European Initiative
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To assist its members in European integration and socio-economic development.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Free Trade Association
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote free trade and economic integration among its members.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To provide weather and climate-related satellite data, images, and products.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Patent Organisation
european_regional_organizations.members: 38 member states including all EU countries
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To grant European patents using a unified procedure.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation
european_regional_organizations.members: 41 member states and 2 comprehensive agreement states
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To manage air traffic control across Europe.

european_regional_organizations.name: Council of the Baltic Sea States
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote cooperation for sustainability, security, and growth in the Baltic Sea region.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Organization for Nuclear Research
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To operate the world's largest particle physics laboratory.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Space Agency
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To coordinate the financial and intellectual resources of its members for space exploration.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Molecular Biology Laboratory
european_regional_organizations.members: 27 member states, 2 associate members, and 2 prospect members
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To conduct research in molecular biology, study molecular mechanisms of life, and provide services to scientists in the member states.

european_regional_organizations.name: Benelux
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote economic collaboration and integration between its three member states.

european_regional_organizations.name: Nordic Council
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To facilitate political and cultural cooperation among Nordic countries.

european_regional_organizations.name: Visegrád Group
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote cooperation and further the European integration of member countries.

european_regional_organizations.name: EUREKA
european_regional_organizations.members: Over 40 countries including all EU members
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To support market-oriented research and development and innovation projects.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Cooperation in Science and Technology
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To enable researchers to set up their interdisciplinary research networks across Europe.

european_regional_organizations.name: Community for Democracy and Rights of Nations
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To collaborate on political and economic matters among member states.

european_regional_organizations.name: South-East European Cooperation Process
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To foster good neighbourly relations and cooperation in the region.

european_regional_organizations.name: West Nordic Council
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote mutual interests and cooperation between the West Nordic countries.

european_regional_organizations.name: Three Seas Initiative
european_regional_organizations.members: 12 EU countries between the Adriatic, Baltic, and Black seas
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote cooperation in energy, infrastructure, and digitalization.

european_regional_organizations.name: British–Irish Council
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote positive, practical relationships among its members.

european_regional_organizations.name: Nordic Investment Bank
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To finance projects that improve competitiveness and the environment of the Nordic and Baltic regions.

european_regional_organizations.name: Northern Dimension Partnership in Public Health and Social Well-being
european_regional_organizations.members: EU, Russia, Norway, Iceland, and regional organizations
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To address public health and social well-being concerns in the Northern Dimension area.

european_regional_organizations.name: Organisation for Joint Armament Cooperation
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To facilitate and manage collaborative armament programs between member states.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Centre for Medium-range Weather Forecasts
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To provide accurate medium-range weather forecasts and climate-related services.

european_regional_organizations.name: Benelux
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To foster economic cooperation and integration among its member states.

european_regional_organizations.name: Belgium–Luxembourg Economic Union
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To create a single economic space between the two countries.

european_regional_organizations.name: British–Irish Council
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote positive relationships among the governments of the British Isles.

european_regional_organizations.name: Central Commission for Navigation on the Rhine
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To ensure cooperation for navigation on the Rhine River.

european_regional_organizations.name: Assembly of European Regions
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To foster interregional cooperation and advocate for regional interests in Europe.

european_regional_organizations.name: Eiroforum
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To collaborate on large-scale scientific projects and promote science and technology.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Organization for Nuclear Research
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To operate the world's largest particle physics laboratory and conduct high-energy physics research.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Southern Observatory
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To provide state-of-the-art research facilities for astronomers and promote international cooperation in astronomy.

european_regional_organizations.name: European Synchrotron Radiation Facility
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To operate a powerful synchrotron radiation source for multidisciplinary research.

european_regional_organizations.name: Institut Laue–Langevin
european_regional_organizations.members: France, Germany, and the United Kingdom
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To operate a leading neutron science facility for research in physics, chemistry, biology, and materials science.

european_regional_organizations.name: Baltic Marine Environment Protection Commission
european_regional_organizations.members: All Baltic Sea countries and the EU
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To protect the marine environment of the Baltic Sea from all sources of pollution.

european_regional_organizations.name: Council of the Baltic Sea States
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote growth, sustainability, and security in the Baltic Sea region.

european_regional_organizations.name: Northern Dimension Partnership in Public Health and Social Well-being
european_regional_organizations.members: EU, Russia, Norway, Iceland, and regional organizations
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To address public health and social well-being concerns in the Northern Dimension area.

european_regional_organizations.name: Three Seas Initiative
european_regional_organizations.members: 12 EU countries between the Adriatic, Baltic, and Black seas
european_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote cooperation in energy, infrastructure, and digitalization.
